product_name: Sea to Summit Inflatable Paddle Float
long_description: Designed to aid in self rescue, this inflatable, single-chamber paddle float can be used with a paddle to stabilize your kayak in the event of a capsize and make reentry easier.
short_description: Designed to aid in self rescue, this inflatable, single-chamber paddle float can be used with a paddle to stabilize your kayak in the event of a capsize and make reentry easier.
